title: Eternum Rek'Sai or Pool Party?
body:
Hey my name's First Poro Unity, and I've got a question.
Which skin looks better, Eternum or Pool-Party Rek'Sai?
Actully the Pool-Party one is reduced by 28%. (975 RP)
And the Eternum costs 1350.
Would you buy the Pool-Party because it's reduced, or Eternum bcs. it looks better?
Tell it me in the comments!
Which would _you_ buy, and which looks better you think?
{{champion:421}}

replies.body: I personally think Eternum is cooler, but if you want a funny skin, you should buy Pool Party. It depends on you.
Thank you for your opinion, helped me some 2 decide it.

I think you not really need a skin if you don't know, which one do you prefer more than the other. Its all about this "I want that skin, because it lokks nice to me." But if you dont have one to prefer, maybe you shouldn't buy one of them and pic an icecream ore something like this for the money.
I reported this as "offensive". I got my own opinion but asked other _nice_ peoples what they do prefer. Do you have got a problem with that?

I think he means something else.
You should wait for the skin until u really have clearded your mind. (Wait longer for the skin and the more u will know which one u really like/want)

reternum: looks coller. Animations nearly same as normal reksai
Pool party: not so cool but funny. Animations are different (more). But i think on normal games. enemies could react faster to you. Because i think lightblue is really easy to see. 

So i think eternum does bring a bit more. But i would like better animations.

(my english is not the best. so forgive me the mistakes. :) ) 

Have a nice day. ^^

Hey  this is the German Forum. If you would talk in German with us would it be great.
If you cant speak German try the english forum.
y, im sorry. thought more people would read it if its english xD but its the german forum ^^
